s: February 26, 2019 - Now, you can add milk to the list of items that Amazon makes.  · Spotted by Amazon tracker TJI Research, listings have begun to appear on Amazon for milk under the company's Happy Belly private label. t: Private Label Retailer of the Year: Amazon | Grocery Dive
s: December 9, 2019 - Amazon spokesperson Nell Rona told Grocery Dive in an email that Happy Belly is its most popular food and beverage label. That same month, Amazon also debuted coconut water under its Solimo brand. Solimo's coffee pods currently sit on Amazon.com's Best Seller list among grocery products.

t: Amazon Has Started Selling its Own Happy Belly Brand Coffee
s: November 23, 2016 - Amazon has quietly introduced its own coffee brand, called Happy Belly, promising online shoppers “artisan, small batch roasted blends like those found at your favorite neighborhood coffee shop.” · The initial coffee products under the brand are a house blend, breakfast blend, espresso roast, french roast and Italian roast decaf.
